abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Blade of Shadows is 6.

abilities.name: Shadow Form
abilities.description: Be'lakor can shift his physical form to be as insubstantial as the mists of Ulgu – and just as hard to land a telling blow upon.
abilities.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

abilities.name: The Dark Master
abilities.timing: Once Per Battle, Enemy Hero Phase
abilities.description: Many puppets dance on Be'lakor's infernal strings. Few realise as much until their fate is sealed.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target is picked to use an ability, roll a dice as a reaction. On a 3+, that ability has no effect.

abilities.name: Deadly Trap
abilities.timing: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Combat Phase
abilities.description: The Dark Master delights in lethal reversals of expectation and fate.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly Slaves to Darkness units within this unit's combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+, that target has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Enfeeble Foe
abilities.description: With a series of hissed incantations, Be'lakor instils visions of loss and despair in the minds of his enemies to drain them of their fighting spirit.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:
• Subtract 1 from hit rolls from the target's combat attacks.
• The target's combat attacks cannot score critical hits (treat them as regular hits instead).
